title: Tormented (1960 Thriller) A Terrifying Story of Supernatural Passion! Directed by Bert I. Gordon 4K

sources.title: Tormented (1960 Thriller) A Terrifying Story of Supernatural Passion! Directed by Bert I. Gordon 4K
sources.description:
Jilted lover Vi (Juli Reding) takes a fatal fall, triggering her ex lover Tom's (Richard Carlson) desperate scramble to silence her vengeful ghost before marrying heiress Meg (Lugene Sanders). But when ferryman Nick (Joe Turkel) uncovers the truth and demands payment, Tom must outmaneuver the blackmailer and the escalating spectral attacks threatening to expose his deadly secret.

Alternative title: Eye of the Dead / Tormented... by the She-Ghost of Haunted Island! (1960)

Colorized version https://youtu.be/E0uiampGq_8

Director: Bert I. Gordon
Writers: George Worthing Yates, Bert I. Gordon

Actors: Richard Carlson, Juli Reding, Susan Gordon, Lugene Sanders
Genres: Horror, Thriller, Romance
Release date: September 22, 1960
Filming location: Santa Catalina Island

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdZjOUSqIZM6IdRizGyMIXjz

@CultCinemaClassics
